glosses: To become familiar with, to get or grow accustomed to, to get used to.
To suit over time, to grow into.
To get addicted to, to develop a habit for.
To catch fire, to have flames start to come out of it, to become aflame.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish آلشمق or آلیشمق (alışmaḳ), equivalent to al- (“to take, to receive”) + -ış (“reciprocative suffix”) + -mak.
